articles.title: Late Mail: Knights lose key forward, Panthers shuffle bench - Fox Sports
articles.description: Newcastle has lost star forward Lachlan Fitzgibbon as the Knights aim to maintain their unbeaten streak.
articles.content:
Meanwhile the Panthers will be without Liam Martin, who has been replaced on the bench due to a leg injury.
